narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Variety Children's Hospital is a General Acute Care Hospital  Children provider based in Weston, FL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $22.7M in Medicaid payments across 144K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $22.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
